setCriteria(Criteria) - Method in class bookroom.Book
Set the criteria of the book.
setCriteria(Criteria) - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Sets the new criteria for the bookcase.
setCriteriaType(String) - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Sets the new criteria type for the bookcase.
setCriteriaType(LocalDate) - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Specifically sets the criteria type in situations where the criteria is PUBLISHDATE.
setNumOfShelves(int) - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Sets the number of individual shelves.
setPercentRestock(double) - Method in class bookroom.BookshelfGroup
Sets the threshold needed to restock the group.
setPrice(float) - Method in class bookroom.Book
Set the price of the book.
setRestock() - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Sets whether the bookcase needs to be restocked.
shelves - Variable in class bookroom.Bookshelf
The shelves of the bookcase, represented as a List of ArrayLists of Books.
shelves - Variable in class bookroom.BookshelfGroup
The collection of bookshelves as a map.
signalRestock(String) - Method in class bookroom.BookshelfGroup
Signals that the group has been restocked, resetting the appropriate variables.
sortAllShelves() - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Sorts all shelves on the bookcase.
sortSingularShelf(int) - Method in class bookroom.Bookshelf
Sorts the single shelf corresponding to the provided index.
